items.sentence: I\'m sure it wouldn\'t be too hard to find out who hacked into our system.
Mary took her earrings off and put them in the jewelry box on her dresser.
Maybe Tom should consider the possibility that Mary has left him for good.
Men and women between the ages of 25 and 54 have the most stressful lives.
My teacher told me that I should have spent more time preparing my speech.
